data.name: Power (of) Metal
data.detailed_description:
Join Maleqqi's Journey.

On a day, Maleqqi feels a strange sound coming. He feels it through his body.
We wants to find its source. Because this can be the only thing that fulfill his heart.

He meets a Knight that says he can help if Maleqqi proves himself.
And the journey begins.

Maleqqi


Power (of) Metal is a Platformer Rpg with some Souls-like features.

- Proceed through the castle with amazing platformer levels.
- Beat the enemies and take their souls to power Maleqqi.
- Checkpoint system and teleport system will help you around the castle.
- Discover every part of the castle to find secrets.
- Immersive Boss battles.
- Great Metal Music that will accompany through the levels.

data.short_description: Power (of) Metal is a 2D hack/slash platformer, journey of Maleqqi who want to fulfill his emptiness inside of him and he will find the Power (of) Metal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel core i5-4210 1.7ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
